credit_line: Gift of Richard C. Greenleaf Esq. in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
title: deflected element & embroidery
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: Needlework on sheer plain weave foundation fabric
-Herringbone stitch on the back for opaque areas
-On the front, chain stitch for stems
-Deflected element work in various patterns using satin and stem stitches plus running and wrapping stitches
-Edge finished with buttonhole stitch
name: deflected element & embroidery
